attributes.action: use his European influence to make the French clean up after their dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: France is a lovely country apart from the French people who think that in the 21st century it's still OK to cover their streets in dog excrement. We would like the Prime Minister to encourage his French counterpart to legislate against this in order to benefit public health and not ruin any more of our holidays.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
